title: Graphene-doped polymer nanofibers for low-threshold nonlinear optical waveguiding
title_cn: 石墨烯掺杂的聚合物纳米纤维用于低阈值非线性光波导
abstract: Graphene-doped polymer nanofibers are fabricated by taper drawing of solvated polyvinyl alcohol doped with liquid-phase exfoliated graphene flakes. Nanofibers drawn this way typically have diameters measured in hundreds of nanometers and lengths in tens of millimeters; they show excellent uniformity and surface smoothness for optical waveguiding. Owing to their tightly confined waveguiding behavior, light–matter interaction in these subwavelength-diameter nanofibers is significantly enhanced. Using approximately 1350-nm-wavelength femto-second pulses, we demonstrate saturable absorption behavior in these nanofibers with a saturation threshold down to 0.25 pJ pulse−1 (peak power ∼1.3 W). Additionally, using 1064-nm-wavelength nanosecond pulses as switching light, we show all-optical modulation of a 1550-nm-wavelength signal light guided along a single nanofiber with a switching peak power of ∼3.2 W.
abstract_cn: 掺杂石墨烯的聚合物纳米纤维是通过将液相剥落的石墨烯薄片掺入的溶剂化聚乙烯醇的锥度拉伸法制成的。 用这种方法拉制的纳米纤维通常具有几百纳米的直径和数十毫米的长度。 它们对于光波导显示出优异的均匀性和表面光滑度。 由于它们严格的波导行为，这些亚波长直径纳米纤维中的光物质相互作用得到显着增强。 使用大约1350 nm波长的飞秒脉冲，我们证明了在这些纳米纤维中的饱和吸收行为，其饱和阈值低至0.25 pJ脉冲<sup>＆＃8722; 1 </ sup>（峰值功率＆＃8764; 1.3 W ）。 此外，使用1064 nm波长的纳秒脉冲作为开关光，我们展示了沿单根纳米光纤引导的1550 nm波长的信号光的全光调制，开关峰值功率为＆＃8764; 3.2 W。</ p >

title: Polarization shaping of Poincaré beams by polariton oscillations
title_cn: 通过极化子振荡对庞加莱光束进行极化整形
abstract: We propose theoretically and demonstrate experimentally the generation of light pulses whose polarization varies temporally to cover selected areas of the Poincaré sphere with both tunable swirling speed and total duration (1 ps and 10 ps, respectively, in our implementation). The effect relies on the Rabi oscillations of two polariton polarized fields excited by two counter-polarized and delayed pulses. The superposition of the oscillating fields result in the precession of the Stokes vector of the emitted light while polariton lifetime imbalance results in its drift from a circle of controllable radius on the Poincaré sphere to a single point at long times. The positioning of the initial circle and final point allows to engineer the type of polarization spanning, including a full sweeping of the Poincaré sphere. The universality and simplicity of the scheme should allow for the deployment of time-varying full-Poincaré polarization fields in a variety of platforms, timescales, and regimes.
abstract_cn: 我们在理论上提出并在实验上证明了光脉冲的产生，该光脉冲的偏振随时间发生变化以覆盖庞加莱汽车的选定区域。具有可调旋流速度和总持续时间（在我们的实施中分别为1 ps和10 ps）的球体。该效应依赖于由两个反极化和延迟脉冲激发的两个极化子极化场的拉比振荡。振荡场的叠加导致所发射光的斯托克斯矢量进动，而极化子寿命的不平衡导致其从Poincar＆＃233;上可控半径的圆上漂移。长时间内将球体扩展到单个点。初始圆和最终点的位置允许设计极化范围的类型，包括对Poincar＆＃233;的完全扫描。领域。该方案的普遍性和简单性应允许部署随时间变化的全Poincar＆＃233;各种平台，时标和体制中的极化场。

title: Optical delivery of multiple opsin-encoding genes leads to targeted expression and white-light activation
title_cn: 多种视蛋白编码基因的光学传递导致靶向表达和白光激活
abstract: In photodegenerative diseases such as retinitis pigmentosa (RP) and age-related macular degeneration (AMD), progressive loss of vision occurs as a result of degeneration of the periphery of the retina and the macula, respectively. Current optogenetic stimulation-based approaches to vision restoration offer the advantages of cellular specificity, high resolution, and minimal invasiveness over electrode arrays; however, the clinical translation of optogenetic activation suffers from the lack of a method for the delivery of opsins into spatially targeted regions of a retina that has degenerated. Non-targeted opsin delivery through viral or non-viral methods to non-photodegenerated retinal areas will perturb these already functioning retinal regions. Furthermore, viral methods are subject to limitations on the delivery of large plasmids, such as fusion constructs of multiple spectrally separated opsins (e.g., channelrhodopsin-2 (ChR2), chimeric opsin variants (C1V1), ReaChR), which can provide higher photo-excitability than can a single narrow-band opsin under ambient light conditions. Here, we report the ultrafast near-infrared laser-based spatially targeted transfection of single and multiple opsins and present a comparison with the opsin expression distribution achieved using another non-viral, but non-targeted, transfection method, lipofection. Functional evaluation of cells transfected with multiple opsins using the laser method revealed a significantly higher white-light-induced photocurrent than in cells expressing a single opsin (ChR2). The laser-assisted targeted delivery of multiple opsin-encoding genes to the peripheral retina/macula is ideal for sensitizing retinal areas that have degenerated, thus paving the way toward the restoration of lost vision in RP/AMD patients.
abstract_cn: 在光变性疾病中，例如色素性视网膜炎（RP）和与年龄相关的黄斑变性（AMD），视力的逐渐丧失分别是视网膜和黄斑周围变性引起的。当前基于光遗传刺激的视力恢复方法比电极阵列具有细胞特异性，高分辨率和最小侵入性的优势。然而，光遗传激活的临床翻译遭受缺乏将视蛋白递送到退化的视网膜的空间靶区域的方法的困扰。通过病毒或非病毒方法将非靶向视蛋白递送至非光变性视网膜区域将干扰这些已经起作用的视网膜区域。此外，病毒方法受大型质粒递送的限制，例如多种光谱分离的视蛋白的融合构建体（例如Channelrhodopsin-2（ChR2），嵌合视蛋白变体（C1V1），ReaChR），它们可以提供更高的光与单个窄带视蛋白在环境光条件下相比，具有更高的兴奋性。在这里，我们报告单个和多个视蛋白的超快速近红外激光基于空间目标的转染，并与使用另一种非病毒但非靶向的转染方法lipofection实现的视蛋白表达分布进行比较。使用激光方法转染了多种视蛋白的细胞的功能评估表明，白光诱导的光电流明显高于表达单一视蛋白（ChR2）的细胞。多种视蛋白编码基因的激光辅助靶向递送至周围视网膜/黄斑非常适用于敏化已退化的视网膜区域，从而为恢复RP / AMD患者视力丧失铺平了道路。

title: Thermally reconfigurable quantum photonic circuits at telecom wavelength by femtosecond laser micromachining
title_cn: 飞秒激光微加工在电信波长下可热重构的量子光子电路
abstract: The importance of integrated quantum photonics in the telecom band is based on the possibility of interfacing with the optical network infrastructure that was developed for classical communications. In this framework, femtosecond laser-written integrated photonic circuits, which have already been assessed for use in quantum information experiments in the 800-nm wavelength range, have great potential. In fact, these circuits, being written in glass, can be perfectly mode-matched at telecom wavelength to the in/out coupling fibers, which is a key requirement for a low-loss processing node in future quantum optical networks. In addition, for several applications, quantum photonic devices must be dynamically reconfigurable. Here, we experimentally demonstrate the high performance of femtosecond laser-written photonic circuits for use in quantum experiments in the telecom band, and we demonstrate the use of thermal shifters, which were also fabricated using the same femtosecond laser, to accurately tune such circuits. State-of-the-art manipulation of single- and two-photon states is demonstrated, with fringe visibilities greater than 95%. The results of this work open the way to the realization of reconfigurable quantum photonic circuits based on this technological platform.
abstract_cn: 在电信频段中集成量子光子学的重要性是基于与为经典通信开发的光网络基础设施接口的可能性。在这种框架下，飞秒激光写入的集成光子电路（已经被评估用于800纳米波长范围的量子信息实验）具有巨大的潜力。实际上，用玻璃编写的这些电路可以在电信波长下与输入/输出耦合光纤进行完美模式匹配，这是未来量子光学网络中低损耗处理节点的关键要求。另外，对于几种应用，量子光子器件必须是可动态重新配置的。在这里，我们通过实验演示了飞秒激光写入的光子电路在电信频段量子实验中的高性能，并且演示了使用同样使用飞秒激光器制造的热转换器来精确调谐此类电路。展示了单光子和双光子状态的最新技术，其条纹可见度大于95％。这项工作的结果为基于该技术平台的可重构量子光子电路的实现开辟了道路。

title: Mechanism of mechanical quenching and mechanoluminescence in phosphorescent CaZnOS:Cu
title_cn: 磷光CaZnOS：Cu的机械淬灭和机械发光机理
abstract: This article reports a new phosphorescent material, CaZnOS:Cu, that exhibits two types of mechano-optical conversion: mechanical quenching and mechanoluminescence. An intense mechanical quenching of phosphorescence corresponding to mechanical stimuli can be achieved in CaZnOS:Cu within a short decay time period. Over time, it gradually changes to mechanoluminescence when a mechanical load is applied. We propose that the mechanical quenching and mechanoluminescence arise from the different roles of shallow and deep traps in CaZnOS:Cu. CaZnOS:Cu has promising applications in monitoring mechanical stress in industrial plants, structures, and living bodies.
abstract_cn: 本文报道了一种新型的磷光材料CaZnOS：Cu，它表现出两种类型的机械-光学转换：机械淬灭和机械发光。 可以在较短的衰减时间内在CaZnOS：Cu中实现与机械刺激相对应的强烈磷光机械淬灭。 随着时间的流逝，当施加机械负载时，它逐渐变为机械发光。 我们提出机械淬火和机械发光是由于CaZnOS：Cu中浅层陷阱和深层陷阱的不同作用引起的。 CaZnOS：Cu在监测工厂，建筑物和生物体内的机械应力方面具有广阔的应用前景。

title: On-chip light sources for silicon photonics
abstract: Serving as the electrical to optical converter, the on-chip silicon light source is an indispensable component of silicon photonic technologies and has long been pursued. Here, we briefly review the history and recent progress of a few promising contenders for on-chip light sources in terms of operating wavelength, pump condition, power consumption, and fabrication process. Additionally, the performance of each contender is also assessed with respect to thermal stability, which is a crucial parameter to consider in complex optoelectronic integrated circuits (OEICs) and optical interconnections. Currently, III-V-based silicon (Si) lasers formed via bonding techniques demonstrate the best performance and display the best opportunity for commercial usage in the near future. However, in the long term, direct hetero-epitaxial growth of III–V materials on Si seems more promising for low-cost, high-yield fabrication. The demonstration of high-performance quantum dot (QD) lasers monolithically grown on Si strongly forecasts its feasibility and enormous potential for on-chip lasers. The superior temperature-insensitive characteristics of the QD laser promote this design in large-scale high-density OEICs. The Germanium (Ge)-on-Si laser is also competitive for large-scale monolithic integration in the future. Compared with a III-V-based Si laser, the biggest potential advantage of a Ge-on-Si laser lies in its material and processing compatibility with Si technology. Additionally, the versatility of Ge facilitates photon emission, modulation, and detection simultaneously with a simple process complexity and low cost.
abstract_cn: 片上硅光源用作电光转换器，是硅光子技术必不可少的组成部分，并一直受到人们的追捧。在这里，我们从工作波长，泵浦条件，功耗和制造工艺方面简要回顾了一些有前途的片上光源竞争者的历史和最新进展。此外，还针对热稳定性来评估每个竞争者的性能，这是在复杂的光电集成电路（OEIC）和光学互连中要考虑的关键参数。当前，通过键合技术形成的基于III-V的硅（Si）激光器展示出最佳性能，并在不久的将来展示出最佳的商业应用机会。但是，从长远来看，对于低成本，高产量的制造而言，III和V材料在Si上的直接异质外延生长似乎更有希望。单片生长在Si上的高性能量子点（QD）激光器的演示强烈预测了其可行性和片上激光器的巨大潜力。 QD激光器出色的温度不敏感特性在大规模高密度OEIC中促进了这种设计。将来，锗（Ge）-on-Si激光器在大规模单片集成方面也具有竞争力。与基于III-V的Si激光器相比，Ge-on-Si激光器的最大潜在优势在于其材料和与Si技术的工艺兼容性。此外，Ge的多功能性可同时促进光子的发射，调制和检测，且工艺简单，成本低。
